# 🛡️ Branch Protection Status

<!-- This file is auto-generated by the protection audit workflow -->

## Main Branch Protection

| Protection Rule | Status | Description |
|----------------|--------|-------------|
| 🔒 **Pull Request Required** | ✅ Enabled | All changes must come through PR |
| 👥 **Review Requirements** | ✅ 1+ required | At least 1 approval needed |
| 📋 **CODEOWNERS Review** | ✅ Required | Code owners must approve changes |
| ✔️ **Status Checks** | ✅ 9 checks | All CI tests must pass |
| 🔄 **Dismiss Stale Reviews** | ✅ Enabled | Reviews dismissed on new commits |
| 🚫 **Push Restrictions** | ✅ Core team only | Only @zopiolabs/core can push |

### Required Status Checks

#### PR Validation (`validate-pr.yml`)
- ✅ `quick-checks` - Commit message validation
- ✅ `code-quality` - TypeScript & security checks
- ✅ `build-matrix (18.x)` - Node 18 build
- ✅ `build-matrix (20.x)` - Node 20 build
- ✅ `build-matrix (22.x)` - Node 22 build
- ✅ `performance` - Bundle size analysis
- ✅ `pr-status-report` - Overall status

#### Build Verification (`build.yml`)
- ✅ `build (18.x)` - Node 18 build & test
- ✅ `build (20.x)` - Node 20 build & test
